Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town and Time Discrepancies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town and the initial mystery surrounding its authenticity, focusing on the woman in the green hat and her temporal displacement.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Scene and Woman's Realization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the setting in a bustling saloon in Ghost Town and focuses on the woman in the green hat's initial shock and realization about the historical authenticity of the scene.

narrative_arcs.title: Woman's Internal Thoughts on Time Discrepancy

sub_scenes.title: Conversation about Leaving Ghost Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a conversation between a man in a blue hat and a blonde woman, highlighting the man's urgency to leave Ghost Town due to perceived danger.

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town's Past and Imminent Demolition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Nan's memories of Ghost Town and the revelation of its impending destruction for an airport, creating conflict and emotional distress.

sub_scenes.title: Woman's Memory and Clarification of Ghost Town's State
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Nan's nostalgic memories of Ghost Town and introduces a clarification about its current state as Merrick Gulch.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification of Ghost Town's Current State

sub_scenes.title: Airport Construction Plans and Nan's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene unveils the surveyors' plans to build an airport on Ghost Town's site and Nan's shocked and emotional reaction to this news.

narrative_arcs.title: Reaction to Airport Plan - Initial Shock and Disbelief

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Tensions and Demolition's Onset
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the relationship dynamics between Nan and Cal amidst the backdrop of Ghost Town's demolition, highlighting their contrasting views and emotional conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Notions and Understanding between Nan and Cal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a conversation between Nan and Cal about Nan's romantic ideals and Cal's more practical nature, exploring their relationship dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Cal's Perspective on Dreams and Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Demolition of Ghost Town and Immediate Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the active demolition of Ghost Town and Nan's shocked and possibly frightened reaction to the chaotic scene.

Major_Arcs.title: Business Discussions and Paternal Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to domestic and business logistics, highlighting Nan's frustration with her father's dismissive attitude and their escalating conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Business Logistics and Horse Rental Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with business discussions about shipping and transitions to plans for renting horses for the airport construction, involving Nan and her father.

sub_scenes.title: Paternal Threat and Nan's Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating conflict between Nan and her father, culminating in a paternal threat and Nan's subsequent humiliation and distress.

Major_Arcs.title: Reassurance and Resolve in Relationship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan receiving comfort and relationship advice, leading to her internal resolve to seek clarity in her relationship with Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Maternal Comfort and Generational Views
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan being comforted by her mother, receiving relationship advice, and the parents discussing generational views on relationships.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation of Cal's Affection and Effort

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Internal Resolve and Business Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's internal resolve to seek clarity in her relationship with Cal, followed by her business confrontation regarding the horse deal.

Major_Arcs.title: Emotional Confession and Cal's Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan's emotional confession to Cal, his cryptic response, and his subsequent departure, leading to a period of longing and her pursuit.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Cryptic Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan expressing deep feelings to Cal and his somewhat cryptic response, setting a tone of uncertainty.

narrative_arcs.title: Expression of Deep Feelings and Cryptic Response
Passage of Time and Lingering Longing
Confession of Pursuit and Revealed Motivation

Major_Arcs.title: Blizzard and Crisis Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a severe blizzard, creating a crisis for livestock and people, but ultimately resolved through 'Operation Hay Lift' and renewed hope.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation about Changed Behavior and Blizzard Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan confronting Cal about his changed behavior, interrupted by the arrival of Mr. Wills with a grim weather report.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Confession about Changed Behavior
Indoor Discussion of Weather and Worry for Loved Ones
Cal's Determined Resolve and Acceptance of Responsibility

sub_scenes.title: Despair, Hope, and Operation Hay Lift
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts initial despair about the situation, followed by the hopeful arrival of 'Operation Hay Lift', bringing relief and renewed hope.

narrative_arcs.title: Recollection of Restlessness and Expression of Hopelessness
Arrival of the Plane and Fodder Drop
Relief, Gratitude, and Renewed Hope with 'Operation Hay Lift'

Major_Arcs.title: Western Town Showdown and Differing Perspectives
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a classic Western town setting, depicting a cowboy showdown and the varied reactions and interpretations of the event from different bystanders.

sub_scenes.title: Cowboy Showdown and Initial Reactions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a cowboy showdown in a Western town and captures the immediate reactions from onlookers, ranging from admiration to condemnation.

narrative_arcs.title: Defense and Critique of Cowboy's Manners

Major_Arcs.title: Jeff's Hero Worship and Family Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Jeff's hero worship of Clyde Surrett, his escalating conflict with Sally, and Pete's attempt to intervene and help.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Concern and Confrontation over Gun Handling
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally's concern about Jeff's hero worship and her confrontation with him about handling their father's gun.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Concern for Jeff's Hero Worship
Sally's Disappointment and Jeff's Clyde Surrett Defense
Jeff's Justification of Clyde Surrett and Dismissal of Chane Benson
Sally's Rejection of Jeff's Claims and Warning
Jeff's Threat and Sally's Fearful Response

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Frustration and Plea to Clyde, Pete's Commitment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Sally's frustration with Jeff, her plea to Clyde Surrett for help, and Pete's commitment to intervene and assist Jeff.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Plea to Clyde and His Reassurance
Pete's Commitment to Helping Jeff and Sally's Appreciation
Pete's Flashback and Gun Advice to Young Jeff
Introduction of Mr. Benson and His Humble Response

Major_Arcs.title: Clyde's Article, Town Tension, and Benson's Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the fallout from Clyde's article, the rising tension in town, and Mr. Benson's reaction and intervention in the conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Town Outrage and Sally's Warning to Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the town's angry reaction to Clyde's article and Sally's subsequent warning to Mr. Benson about the escalating tension.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Warning to Mr. Benson about Clyde's Anger
Mr. Benson's Dismissal of Danger and Confrontation with Sally
Mr. Benson's Justification for Staying in Town

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Conflict and Newspaper's Role
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows escalating confrontations regarding Clyde's article, his defiant stance, and the newspaper's role in the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Defense Regarding Clyde's Article
Background on Clyde's Defiant Actions and Consequences
Sally and Jeff's Discussion about Clyde and Benson's Conflict
Dinner Invitation and Evaluation of Chane's Skills

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Tension and Violent Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the dinner invitation for Chane, escalating tensions between Jeff and Sally, culminating in a violent confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Moonlight Tension
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the scene at dinner with Chane, Jeff, and Sally, highlighting underlying tensions and ulterior motives, followed by a moonlight conversation.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Intervention and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chane's interruption, Benson's violent intervention against Jeff, and the subsequent pursuit related to Clyde.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Urgency and Chane's Pursuit of Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Town Conflict and Newspaper Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the resolution of the town confrontation, Benson's departure, and the subsequent work at the newspaper office.

sub_scenes.title: Tense Standoff and Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the tense standoff between Benson and Jeff, the anxious wait, and the eventual relief at Benson leaving town.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation and Fear at the Door

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Ranch Conflict and New Boss
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting at a ranch and a conflict involving a new boss and ranch troubles, shifting focus from town to ranch life.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Brawl and New Hired Man
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a ranch brawl and introduces Steve Daley as the new hired man and potential 'Boss'.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Brawl and Rejection of Gunplay
Introducing Steve Daley and the New Boss
Confirmation of Betsy's Competence and Steve's Approval

sub_scenes.title: Assessing Steve and Ranch Troubles Unveiled
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on assessing Steve's character and introduces the serious ranch troubles including missing cattle and sabotage, leading to investigation plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Steve's Casual Acceptance and Betsy's Amusement
Hank's Skepticism and Betsy's Defense of Steve
Betsy's Accusation and Hank's Explanation of Ranch Troubles
Mutual Caution and Agreement to Investigate
Departure to Town and Buckboard Ride
Questioning Hank's Orders and Material for Dress

Major_Arcs.title: Town Confrontation and Romantic Resolution at Ranch
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the arrival in town, a violent confrontation, followed by a shift back to the ranch where romantic developments and resolutions occur.

sub_scenes.title: Town Arrival and Bridges' Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy and Steve arriving in town and immediately facing a confrontation with Fred Bridges and his men.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Policy, Gunslinger Proposition, and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts back to the ranch and focuses on Betsy asserting her ranch policy against gunmen, Steve's proposition to be a gunslinger for her, and their romantic confessions and resolutions.

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Troubles, Valley Route Danger, and Past Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new ranch troubles involving Bridges, valley route danger, and delves into Steve's past betrayal, creating suspense and conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Bridges' Complaint and Valley Route Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Old Man Bridges' complaint and Betsy's warning about the dangerous valley route, foreshadowing conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Valley Route Warning and Impending Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Romantic Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in a confrontation at Devil's Pass, featuring Betsy's injury but leading to a romantic reunion and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confrontation and Betsy's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts an emotional confrontation between Betsy and Steve, Steve's departure, and Betsy's determined pursuit to Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Standoff, Injury, and Romantic Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the confrontation at Devil's Pass, Betsy's intervention and injury, and their subsequent romantic reunion and resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: New Romantic Conflict and Ranch Rivalry
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new romantic conflict and ranch rivalry, shifting to new characters and a different setting.

sub_scenes.title: Concern for Dave and Ranch Morning Scene
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a woman's concern for Dave and shifts to a ranch morning scene with reflections and observations.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern for Dave and Father's Disapproval
Reflection on Morning Routine and Curley's Presence
Concern about Curley and Bear Fenin's Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Fencing Dispute and Gun Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a fencing dispute, escalating tension with Fred Gordon and Curley, and the threat of gun violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Dispute Over Fencing and Grazing Land
Escalating Tension Over Fence and Water Access
Defensive Stance and Threat of Gunplay
Curley's Gun Draw and Impending Violence

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Entanglements and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc delves into complex romantic entanglements, featuring Curley's apology, Carrie's conflicted feelings, and Fred's manipulative betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Curley's Apology and Carrie's Conflicted Feelings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Curley apologizing and Carrie expressing her conflicted feelings for Dave and Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie and Dave Discussing Feelings and Fred

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal, Confrontation, and Resolution with Fred
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Fred's manipulative betrayal, Carrie's angry confrontation and rejection, leading to a resolution and emotional release.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Confrontation at Carlton's Office

Major_Arcs.title: New Romance with Dave and Final Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie's new romantic development with Dave, culminating in a final romantic resolution and happy ending.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Encounter with Dave, and Buckboard Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's reflection on her victory over Fred, her chance encounter with Dave, and Dave's suspicion during a buckboard ride.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Fred's Defeat and Carrie's Victory
Chance Encounter and Casual Conversation at the Store
Inquiries About Fred and Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Reunion, Confrontation, and Final Romantic Resolution with Fred (Re-reconciliation?)
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a reunion with Dave, a confrontation with Fred by Carrie's father, and a final romantic resolution between Carrie and Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Concern and Arrival of Visitors

Major_Arcs.title: Chris and Dirk's Story - Injury, Chase, and Romantic Climax with Rance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline focusing on Chris and Dirk, their escape, the chase, and Chris's romantic climax with Rance Cready.

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Arrival and Brother's Injury Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chris and Dirk, with Dirk's urgent arrival and the revelation of his gunshot injury.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation Plan and Marshal's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the father's investigation plan and the arrival of Marshal Rance Cready, setting up confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Confrontation and Claim of Authority

sub_scenes.title: Legal Justification, Conditional Stay, and Time Passage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Rance Cready explaining the legal situation, offering a conditional stay, and a passage of time leading to changed dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Passage of Time and Acceptance of Reality

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confession, Escape Plan, and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chris's love confession, contemplation of escape, the start of the chase, and the violent shootout.

narrative_arcs.title: Re-emergence of Duty and Dirk's Fate
Moral Dilemma: Mercy Killing vs. Survival

sub_scenes.title: Escape to Mexico and Final Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the escape storyline with Dirk's successful escape to Mexico and culminates in a final romantic climax and marriage proposal between Chris and Rance.

narrative_arcs.title: Providing First Aid and Assessing Injury
Parting Ways and Concern for Criminal Escape
Plea to Return and Confession of Love
Rance's Self-Recrimination and Awareness of Burden
Concern for Riding and Inquiry about Dirk
Successful Escape to Mexico and Relief
Rance's Reassurance and Readiness for Action
